Class Farmer

java.lang.Object
Farmer
public class Farmer extends Object
The Farmer class contains records related to the farmer such as wallet and level. This class also includes methods that allow the farmer to interact with the tiles.

  • Constructor Details

    • Farmer

      public Farmer()
      Constructor of Farmer initializes with the following: 1. 100 Objectcoins 2. 0 Levels 3. 0 Experience Points 4. FARMER status 5. No earn bonus, cost reduction, and bonus limit increase

  • Method Details

    • plow

      public void plow(Tile tile)
      "Farmer plows a tile" by setting isPlowed to true
      Parameters:
      tile - - tile that will be plowed by the farmer

    • plant

      public void plant(Tile tile, String plant, Tile[][] tiles)
      "Farmer plants a seed on a tile" by setting crop with a new instance of Crop
      Parameters:
      tile - - tile where the seed will be planted (receives new instance of Crop)
      plant - - name of the seed to be planted (determines which Crop to be instantiated)
      tiles - - set of tiles in the plot (used to validate tree crops)

    • water

      public void water(Crop crop)
      "Farmer waters a crop" by adding 1 to timesWatered
      Parameters:
      crop - - crop that will be watered by the farmer

    • fertilize

      public void fertilize(Crop crop)
      "Farmer fertilizes a tile" by adding 1 to timesFertilized
      Parameters:
      crop - - crop that will be fertilized by the farmer

    • harvest

      public void harvest(Tile tile)
      "Farmer harvests crops on a tile" by setting crop to null and adding value to the wallet and experience of farmer
      Parameters:
      tile - - tile whose crop will be harvested by the farmer

    • dig

      public void dig(Tile tile)
      "Farmer digs crops on a tile" by setting crop to null and setting the isPlowed to false
      Parameters:
      tile - - tile will be shoveled by the farmer

    • mine

      public void mine(Tile tile)
      "Farmer mines a tile" by setting hasRock to false
      Parameters:
      tile - - tile that will be mined by the farmer

    • register

      public void register()
      "Farmer registers" by changing FarmerType and the associated bonus

    • gainExperience

      public void gainExperience(double points)
      "Farmer gains experience points" by adding value to the experience of the farmer, leveling up if it reaches 100
      Parameters:
      points - - experience points gained from the action

    • isTreeValid

      public boolean isTreeValid(Tile[][] tiles, Tile tile)
      This function determines if the farmer can plant a tree on the given tile
      Parameters:
      tiles - - set of tiles in the plot to be used to check the 8 surrounding tiles of the given
      tile - - tile to be examined
